abstract: A house that produces more energy than it uses is a rarity in Russia, where enough energy is wasted each year to power all of France.
snippet: A house that produces more energy than it uses is a rarity in Russia, where enough energy is wasted each year to power all of France.
lead_paragraph: On a recent Saturday, a bus filled with local architects arrived at a field 12 miles southwest of Moscow. As a light snow began to fall, they made their way past a handful of model homes to a wooden A-frame whose spare, modern lines could be straight out of Dwell magazine.
